SEARCH
Module com.ekidroske.kidroske_elise_lms
Package controller

Class LibraryController

java.lang.Object
controller.LibraryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBookController
public class LibraryController extends Object implements IBookController
This class processes and responds to user interaction with the user interface. This class manages the flow of information between the user and the application layer.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the application layer and the user interface components.

    • setRelatedFieldEmpty

      private void setRelatedFieldEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField relatedField, String oldText, String newText)
      Clears a related TextField when text is entered into the selected TextField. Also clears the selected book being displayed.
      Parameters:
      relatedField - TextField sibling of the selected TextField.
      oldText - Text before the text was changed.
      newText - Text added during text change.

    • setSelectedBook

      private void setSelectedBook(int selectedId)
      Selects a book and sets its focus if present in the ListView.
      Parameters:
      selectedId - Int barcode of book to set selected.

    • onRemoveBook

      public void onRemoveBook(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Evaluates a user's request to delete a book. Attempts retrieval of a book object from the internal database. If the book exists, will seek user confirmation on the delete request.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • onCheckOutBooks

      public void onCheckOutBooks(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Responds to the user's request to check out a book. If the proper information is given, instructs the application layer to process the request.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • onCheckInBooks

      public void onCheckInBooks(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Responds to the user's request to check in a book. If the proper information is given, instructs the application layer to process the request.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • onAddBooksFromFileClick

      public void onAddBooksFromFileClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Prompts user to provide a text file using a FileChooser. Instructs the application layer to process the provided file for Book objects.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • onAddBooksFromDatabaseClick

      public void onAddBooksFromDatabaseClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Launches a dialog to obtain database connection information from the user for an external database. Instructs the application layer to attempt connection with the provided database to process Book objects.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • onDisplayBooks

      public void onDisplayBooks(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Displays the library's collection to the Book ListView.
      Parameters:
      event - On click event triggered by user.

    • setBookInformation

      private void setBookInformation(Book book)
      Display's a book's information on the user interface.
      Parameters:
      book - Book to display.

    • clearBookInformation

      private void clearBookInformation()
      Removes information on a single Book object from the user interface.

      Clears the selected Book object and removes its focus.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      book - Book object to be deleted.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
